metadata.title: USN-6715-1 -- unixODBC vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that unixODBC incorrectly handled certain bytes. An attacker could use this issue to execute arbitrary code or cause a crash.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6715-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  odbcinst - 2.3.1-4.1ubuntu0.1~esm2 unixodbc-dev - 2.3.1-4.1ubuntu0.1~esm2 libodbc1 - 2.3.1-4.1ubuntu0.1~esm2 odbcinst1debian2 - 2.3.1-4.1ubuntu0.1~esm2 unixodbc - 2.3.1-4.1ubuntu0.1~esm2 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
